CustomField.description: Comma separate usernames. The trigger code will run only in case of the logged on user's username matches with this list. Its important to note that, the trigger code should run only in case from the WD > PI > Executes the Data Loader or the test classes which at times creates test users and the community user creation process should be skipped as it creates external users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma separate usernames. The trigger code will run only in case of the logged on user's username matches with this list.
CustomField.label: Integration_User(s)
